project.name: C-C196A-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C196A-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive This weakness reads a number to be used as a loop counter. The loop counter is initially read as an unsigned long, then converted to an int. If the number read in is larger than MAX_UINT, it is silently converted to a negative number. This breaks the loop counter logic, resulting in an infinite loop. Good inputs: taint source is 2147483647 or less Bad inputs: taint source is 2147483648 or greater

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="15" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

printf "Cleanup pattern repeated $(grep -E """^evaluating input$""" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) times\n"
SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^evaluating input$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_m5iYAOz1OIZEXjOizb92 AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_58zA94FvHf OR (NOT finished_Uq4fUj8gNU AND NOT (controlled_exit_r4iIIPVhl2 OR continued_execution_SM8MHbdnj6)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_58zA94FvHf OR (NOT finished_Uq4fUj8gNU AND NOT (controlled_exit_r4iIIPVhl2 OR continued_execution_SM8MHbdnj6))) OR controlled_exit_r4iIIPVhl2)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_58zA94FvHf OR (NOT finished_Uq4fUj8gNU AND NOT (controlled_exit_r4iIIPVhl2 OR continued_execution_SM8MHbdnj6)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_58zA94FvHf OR (NOT finished_Uq4fUj8gNU AND NOT (controlled_exit_r4iIIPVhl2 OR continued_execution_SM8MHbdnj6))) OR controlled_exit_r4iIIPVhl2))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
